settings.heading: ReturnÂ EligibilityÂ
settings.row_content:
WeÂ areÂ happyÂ toÂ acceptÂ returnsÂ andÂ exchangesÂ withinÂ 30Â daysÂ fromÂ theÂ dateÂ youÂ receiveÂ yourÂ order


ReturnedÂ productsÂ mustÂ beÂ inÂ theirÂ originalÂ condition,Â withÂ allÂ tags,Â innerÂ packaging,Â andÂ accessoriesÂ intact.Â YouÂ mayÂ inspectÂ theÂ itemÂ toÂ determineÂ itsÂ nature,Â characteristics,Â andÂ functionalityÂ (asÂ youÂ wouldÂ inÂ aÂ physicalÂ store).Â However,Â ifÂ theÂ productÂ showsÂ signsÂ ofÂ useÂ beyondÂ whatÂ isÂ necessaryÂ forÂ suchÂ inspection,Â weÂ reserveÂ theÂ rightÂ toÂ deductÂ aÂ reasonableÂ amountÂ fromÂ yourÂ refundÂ toÂ reflectÂ anyÂ diminishedÂ value.


DueÂ toÂ hygieneÂ reasons,Â wigsÂ mustÂ notÂ beÂ cut,Â bleached,Â dyed,Â altered,Â orÂ visiblyÂ worn.Â TheÂ laceÂ mustÂ remainÂ uncutÂ andÂ unaltered.Â ForÂ theseÂ reasons,Â weÂ recommendÂ inspectingÂ theÂ wigÂ withoutÂ removingÂ theÂ innerÂ hairÂ netÂ orÂ tamperingÂ withÂ theÂ lace.

IfÂ yourÂ itemÂ isÂ deliveredÂ withÂ aÂ hygieneÂ seal,Â onceÂ broken,Â theÂ itemÂ becomesÂ non-returnableÂ unlessÂ itÂ isÂ faulty.

UnauthorisedÂ orÂ returnedÂ itemsÂ thatÂ doÂ notÂ meetÂ theseÂ criteriaÂ mayÂ notÂ beÂ eligibleÂ forÂ aÂ refund.Â 

NEEDÂ TOÂ RETURN.Â

settings.heading: Return Methods and Fees
settings.row_content:
Return Method: Mail
Return Label: Downloadable PDF file provided (free of charge)
Restocking Fee: None
Ailsas will cover the full return shipping costs for eligible returns.
However, if a package is returned to Ailsas.com due to incorrect delivery information provided by the customer or the customer refusing delivery without prior notice, a Â£5 handling fee will be deducted from the refund amount.

settings.heading: Refund Processing
settings.row_content:
Â· Refunds will be refunded to the original payment method
Â· Refund processing time: 3-10 business days, up to 10 business days
Â· If your original card has expired, please contact your card issuer

settings.heading: How to return
settings.row_content:
Â·InitiateÂ aÂ request:Â PleaseÂ contactÂ ourÂ customerÂ serviceÂ withinÂ 30Â daysÂ ofÂ receivingÂ yourÂ order.Â ToÂ initiateÂ aÂ return,Â pleaseÂ provideÂ yourÂ orderÂ number,Â theÂ reasonÂ forÂ theÂ return,Â andÂ clearÂ photosÂ ofÂ theÂ item.Â 
Â· Approval: Upon approval, we will send you a return address.
Â· Refund: After inspecting your returned item, we will complete the refund within 3-10 business days.

settings.heading: Exchanges
settings.row_content:
Exchange Process:
Please follow the return steps above.
Our customer service team will confirm the item you want to exchange and assist you with any price difference.
Once we receive the original item, your exchange will be processed within 5 business days.
All shipping costs related to exchanges are borne by Ailsas.

settings.heading: Order Cancellation
settings.row_content:
IfÂ youÂ wantÂ toÂ cancelÂ yourÂ order,Â pleaseÂ contactÂ ourÂ customerÂ serviceÂ teamÂ withinÂ 1Â hourÂ ofÂ placingÂ theÂ order.Â 

AfterÂ theÂ packageÂ beÂ shippedÂ out,Â theÂ shipmentÂ isÂ notÂ ableÂ toÂ beÂ stopped,Â soÂ ifÂ youÂ wantÂ toÂ cancelÂ theÂ orderÂ butÂ contactÂ usÂ tooÂ late,Â youÂ canÂ returnÂ itÂ forÂ aÂ fullÂ refundÂ afterÂ youÂ receiveÂ theÂ package.Â ForÂ moreÂ informationÂ onÂ howÂ toÂ return,Â pleaseÂ clickÂ onÂ theÂ returnÂ policy.Â TheÂ onlyÂ thingÂ weÂ canÂ doÂ isÂ waitÂ forÂ theÂ parcelÂ toÂ returnÂ toÂ us.Â WhenÂ weÂ areÂ determinedÂ toÂ returnÂ itÂ toÂ theÂ warehouse,Â weÂ canÂ shipÂ itÂ toÂ yourÂ correctÂ addressÂ orÂ returnÂ theÂ orderÂ amountÂ toÂ you.

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Campaign Overview
settings.row_content: We value every voice from our customers. Join our User Generated Content (UGC) Cashback Campaign and receive 50% cashback on your wig order by submitting authentic photos or videos of your wig-wearing experience!

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Eligibility
settings.row_content:
Open to customers who have purchased any wig product directly from ailsas.com.

Accessories (such as wig caps or styling tools) are excluded from this campaign.

Valid only for customers residing in the UK.

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign:  How to Participate
settings.row_content:
Step 1 â€“ Place an order for any wig on our website.

Step 2 â€“ After receiving the wig, submit one of the following:

Clear, front-facing photo(s) wearing the wig (minimum three image)

Short video showing unboxing, trying-on, or styling experience

Step 3 â€“ Email your submission to:
hello@ailsas.com
Include your order number, name, and media content in the email.

By submitting your content, you agree to grant Ailsaâ€™s the rights to use your photos or videos for:

Website display

Ailsaâ€™s may edit or crop submissions for visual clarity without altering the intent or authenticity. All content will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
